data.message: How is it that we  can not control who post to our FB page?  When you have a friend, then you see their friends posting, as well.  I feel that we should be able to turn friends of friends post off.  I  could care less what the friends of friends say or don't say or post or don't post.

replies.message: Hi there, James. Timeline review lets you choose whether posts you're tagged in appear on your Timeline. You can learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1PJjDXB. Hope this helps. -Rey
You didn't answer James' question Facebook because you keep avoiding the question.
I can't even download the app on my phone I don't know what's going on. And I have reset my phone twice.
